data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Martin, Melissa B., Bruce, Niel L., Nowak, Barbara F. (2015): Review of the fish-parasitic genus Ceratothoa Dana, 1852 (Crustacea: Isopoda: Cymothoidae) from Australia, with description of two new species. Zootaxa 3963 (3): 251-294, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3963.3.1
